captions.en: The Sapiens Mapping Project is our visual medical knowledge project.
Google Earth is an example of geographical and social indexing of information.
Now imagine all human body related information indexed inside a 3D virtual human body.
With zoomable tissues at cellular levels and beyond.
We are currently at the 2D level and have a functional atlas made from the Visible Korean Human slices.
This is our computer generated frontal imagine from the 2500 slices. You can even see every slice.
It will be integrated with subject dot raw, the terms hierarchy and dataverse, the data management system.
The Sapiens Mapping Project.  Know thy self.
